description: Welcome to Laurelwood, an exceptional townhouse community in the heart of Richmondâ€™s desirable Granville area! This spacious 3-level, 3 beds, 3 baths home offers 1,166sf of thoughtfully designed living space w/ modern updates, warm laminate floors, & a cozy gas fireplace. The bright kitchen features built-in oven, microwave, & ample cabinetry perfect for entertaining. Enjoy outdoor living w/ your private balcony & quiet rear exposure. The single garage + visitor parking provides convenience, while the well-managed complex offers resort-style amenities including a clubhouse, guest suite, playground, & lush gardens. Located minutes to parks, golf, shopping, & transit. School catchment: Donald E McKay Elem & JN Burnett Secondary School.
